parameters.name: mergedApiIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the AppSync Merged API. This is generated by the AppSync service. In most cases, Merged APIs (especially in your account) only require the API ID value or ARN of the merged API. However, Merged APIs in other accounts (cross-account use cases) strictly require the full resource ARN of the merged API.

parameters.name: associationId
parameters.description: The ID generated by the AppSync service for the source API association.

nested_items.name: associationId
nested_items.description: The ID generated by the AppSync service for the source API association.

nested_items.name: associationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source API association.

nested_items.name: sourceApiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AppSync source API.

nested_items.name: sourceApiArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppSync source API.

nested_items.name: mergedApiArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppSync Merged API.

nested_items.name: mergedApiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AppSync Merged API.

nested_items.name: mergeType
nested_items.description: The property that indicates which merging option is enabled in the source API association.

nested_items.name: sourceApiAssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The state of the source API association.

nested_items.name: sourceApiAssociationStatusDetail
nested_items.description: The detailed message related to the current state of the source API association.

nested_items.name: lastSuccessfulMergeDate
nested_items.description: The datetime value of the last successful merge of the source API association. The result will be in UTC format and your local time zone.
